title: Image properties from concave spherical mirror

content.description: The concave spherical mirror of radius r shown above has focal point F and center of curvature C. An object is placed at a distance 2r from the mirror.
content.question: Which of the following correctly describes the image?

choices.label: Real, inverted, smaller than the object
Real, inverted, larger than the object
Real, upright, smaller than the object
Virtual, upright, smaller than the object
Virtual, inverted, larger than the object

content.answer: Real, inverted, smaller than the object

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
